entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:14 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
